onInvalidated().Description: This method is called when the entire data becomes invalid, most likely through a call to @B_android#database#Cursor#deactivate_E@ or @B_android#database#Cursor#close_E@ on a @B_android#database#Cursor_E@.

onChanged().Description: This method is called when the entire data set has changed, most likely through a call to @B_android#database#Cursor#requery_E@ on a @B_android#database#Cursor_E@.

ClassDesc: Receives call backs when a data set has been changed, or made invalid. The typically data sets that are observed are @B_android#database#Cursor_E@s or @B_android#widget#Adapter_E@s. DataSetObserver must be implemented by objects which are added to a DataSetObservable.
